item.title: Algorithmic Game Theory, Data Science, courses, conferences, journals, and books
item.description: Alon, N., & Spencer, J. H. (2016). The probabilistic method (Fourth edition. ed.). Wiley. Echenique, F., N. Immorlica and V. V. Vazirani (2023). Online and matching-based market design. Cambridge, Cambridge University Press. Blum, A., J. E. Hopcroft and R. Kannan (2020). Foundations of data science. New York, NY, Cambridge University Press. Nisan, N. (2007). Algorithmic game theory. Cambridge University Press. Vazirani, V. V. (2001). Approximation algorithms. Berlin ; New York, Springer.

item.title: Reference bookmarks -- scholars webpages
